pages.text: Chisimu wandu wa ku Mbepo lelo tawe mu shuguli (syao) achisengwaga
Wanganyao ni achiwammakwao tawe m’miwulili, ali ajegeme mu indanda yetandiche chenene
Akwete kupata wanganyao mwalakwemo isogosi (yantundu uliose), soni akwete kupata chilichose chaakuchisaka
(Tachisalilidwa yanti): “Salam (Ntendele uwe kwa jaomanja!)” – Lilowe lyakuumila kwa (Allah) M’mbuje Jwachanasa channope
Sano (wangalumbana ni tachisalilidwa kuti): “Litukusyani lelo jenumanja akulewa (ku wakulupilila)!”
“Ana nganinan’jamuka, E Jenumanja wanache wa Adam! Yanti ngasimun’galagatilaga shetani, chisimu jwalakwejo kukwenu juwele mmagongo jwakuonechela?”
“Ni kuti mungalagatileje Une (Jikape), lyalakweli ni litala lyagoloka?”
“Soni chisimu pamasile pajwaisochelesye mu jenumanja iwumbe yejinji, ana nganim’baga wakola lunda?”
“Aji ni Jahannama ajila jamwaliji nkupedwa chilanga.”
“Jijinjilani lelo, ligongo lya ukafili wamwaliji nkutenda.”
Lelo chitusiwe ngamwa syao, ni gatuwechetekasye makono gao, ni kuwichila umboni ngongolo syao pa ayila yawaliji nkupanganya
Sano tungasache chisimu tungafufwite meso gao, mwanti angalimbanilene litala, nambo angalolite chantiuli
Soni tungasache tungasyusisye (kuwa inyama kapena maganga) pamalo pao pepo, ni nganganakombola kuja m’bujo namuno kuwujila munyuma
Soni jwatukumpaga umi (welewu) tukum’buchisyaga munyuma mukagumbidwe (kakwe, ni jukasawa nti chisawu mwanache). Ana ngakuitagaga mulunda (yalakweyi)

Soni nganitun’jiganya jwalakwe (Muhammadi ﷺ) kwimba ilaanga, nambo soni ngaikuwajilwa kukwakwe (kuwa nkutunga ilaanga). Nganiyiwatu ayi (yayiche nayo Muhammadi ﷺ) ikaweje chikumbusyo kwisa soni Qur’an jakusalichisya (chilichose)
Kuti antetele jwali chijumi (jwakulupila), ni lisimichiche lilowe (lya ilagasyo) pa achimakafili
